availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Green G. Boyle (Union County, Kentucky, physician and politician)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, physician and politician. Virginia native. Married to Frances Northern Boyle in Christian County, Kentucky, on July 15, 1845. Father of Marie Ann Boyle and Emill Allice Boyle. Graduate of the University of Louisville Medical School in Louisville in 1842. Physician in Hopkins County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Physician in Uniontown in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Uniontown in 1860. Member of the Uniontown Board of Councilmen in Union County in 1861.
